    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      Function repeats with every turn: Has 20 percent chance to die and be replaced with dirt Every 5 turns, has chance to spawn a sprout on a surrounding fertile ground Has a 15 percent chance to spawn a koopa on the mature
      Overrides:
      tick in class Ground
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the Ground (i.e: mature)
